basics.name: Bogdan Carpusor
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a highly opinionated software developer with an avid passion for technology and business development. I like meeting new people, working with them and listening to their stories.

work.summary: While working at Cloudbase I was involved in developing different solutions for existing projects and with testing Linux integration drivers, developed by Microsoft.
highlights: Developed the back-end functionality for the Aurora Project. The project involved creating an interface, similar with Openstack Horizon.
Extended Horizon functionality with custom features.
Created python cli tools for the existing testing infrastructure.
Created and ran automation tests on Linux virtual machines in order to check the functionality of the LIS(Linux Integration Services) drivers.

work.summary: I have spent two months on an internship program focused on web development. Together with the other interns we were tasked with developing an internal web platform for the company.
highlights: Implemented the front end design and behaviour of the project.
Developed the module that handled article comments for the application.
Optimized the flow of the application by improving the other modules and refactoring the code bases.

volunteer.summary: BEST, Board of European Students of Technology, is a constantly growing student organisation focused on developing technical students from European Universities.
highlights: Coordinated the activity of the NGO's board.
Developed and implemented the organisation's general strategy.
Maintained close contact with University representatives and partner NGOs.
Worked with other Local BEST Groups and the International Management of BEST.

education.institution: University "Gheorghe Asachi" - Faculty of Automatics and Computer Engineering
